articles.title: Sensex tops 71,000, Nifty hits another high; hawkish BoE, ECB fail to break record run - Moneycontrol
articles.description: India's dollar-dependent economy will not be impacted much by Bank of England and European Central Bank's hawkish tone, say analysts
articles.content:
The Indian market extended its record run to December 15, with the 30-pack Sensex breaching the 71,000-mark and the broad-based Nifty 50 topping 21,300 points in the morning trade.
